version_description:
Firstlight v1.0.4 is here!

There is a lot to mention in this update so let’s get right to it:

— Localizations - The app has been localized for the following languages: Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, and Spanish.

— DNG and TIFF for everyone - Raw DNG and TIFF formats are available for use even without premium membership.

— Print film simulation pack - Premium members now have the option to use four new film simulations based on classic print processing types from the past.

— TIFF processing - TIFF images can now be taken using any combination of film grain, vignette or film simulation.

— Stability and Performance - We have been loving how stable Firstlight has been in the first few releases but we have focused on a couple areas that warranted improvement and now the app is even better for it.

- - - - -
We appreciate your feedback and any questions. Please contact our team at support@filmicpro.com if you would like to share your experience using the app or to ask how to get the most out of your Firstlight experience.

Firstlight v1.0.4 is here!

There is a lot to mention in this update so let’s get right to it:

— Localizations - The app has been localized for the following languages: Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, and Spanish.

— DNG and TIFF for everyone - Raw DNG and TIFF formats are available for use even without premium membership.

— Print film simulation pack - Premium members now have the option to use four new film simulations based on classic print processing types from the past.

— TIFF processing - TIFF images can now be taken using any combination of film grain, vignette or film simulation.

— Stability and Performance - We have been loving how stable Firstlight has been in the first few releases but we have focused on a couple areas that warranted improvement and now the app is even better for it.

- - - - -
We appreciate your feedback and any questions. Please contact our team at support@filmicpro.com if you would like to share your experience using the app or to ask how to get the most out of your Firstlight experience.

A big change for FiLMiC Firstlight, no more subscriptions! Now you can unlock the power of Firstlight with a one-time purchase.
- We have listened to our customers and feel that a single purchase for all that Firstlight has to offer is the right move at this time.
- We appreciate all of the early support and all previous subscribers now own the full app outright.

If you have any questions on how to get the most out of Firstlight or any suggestions please contact our support team at support@filmicpro.com

v1.1.2 of Firstlight includes various bug fixes and performance improvements.


If you have any questions, suggestions or findings please contact us at support@filmicpro.com
